author: kiwi.eth
content: Hello! Currently working on implementing the eth2apis into Prysm, are the APIs currently stable, and if not, is there any estimate on when they will be?

author: adiasg
content:
Hey all! Is it possible for me to get the current slot number from the Eth2 HTTP API? 
AFAICT, `/eth/v1/beacon/headers/head` (https://ethereum.github.io/eth2.0-APIs/#/Beacon/getBlockHeader) returns the current head block, which is not necessarily from the current slot

author: nishant0
content:
An easy way would be to instead fetch genesis 
https://ethereum.github.io/eth2.0-APIs/#/Beacon/getGenesis
`curr_time - genesis_time / slot_time` And you would get your current slot. In mainnet `slot_time` would be 12 seconds

content: Gotcha, that solves the problem! Thanks! ðŸ™‚
